text: Albert Sulon (3 April 1938 – 29 June 2020) was a Belgian footballer. He played as a defender. Sulon played for RFC Liège, UR Namur, RES Jamboise and Tilleur FC. He also earned 6 caps for the Belgian national team between 1965 and 1967. Sulon died on 29 June 2020, aged 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belgian footballers
title: Albert Sulon
